Synopsis: Following the death of a mutual friend (Mark Hampton), two aging Asian men in London's gay community take different approaches to finding true love before time runs out. One, Ashley (Chowee Leow), decides that the way to a man's heart is through a fashionable pair of stiletto heels, while the other, Mel (Steven Lim), wants to dump his current lover and partake of a man buffet.
Title: Cut Sleeve Boys
